question: Show revenue distribution by SKU in Q1 2022
sql: SELECT sku_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY sku_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 5
title: Revenue by SKU (Q1 2022)

question: Top 10 warehouses by inventory value
sql: SELECT w.warehouse_code, w.city, SUM(i.total_value) AS total_inventory_value FROM inventory i JOIN warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_code GROUP BY w.warehouse_code, w.city ORDER BY total_inventory_value DESC LIMIT 10
title: Top Warehouses by Inventory Value

question: Monthly revenue trend in 2022
sql: SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) AS month_no, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) = 2022 GROUP BY month_no ORDER BY month_no
title: Monthly Revenue Trend 2022

question: Inventory quantity by vendor
sql: SELECT vendor_name, SUM(current_inventory_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
title: Inventory Quantity by Vendor

question: Customer type distribution
sql: SELECT customer_type, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM sales GROUP BY customer_type
title: Customer Type Distribution

question: Lead time vs inventory value correlation
sql: SELECT average_lead_time_days, total_value FROM inventory WHERE average_lead_time_days IS NOT NULL
title: Lead Time vs Inventory Value

question: Revenue by warehouse location
sql: SELECT w.city, SUM(s.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales s JOIN warehouses w ON s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_code GROUP BY w.city ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
title: Revenue by City

question: Top selling products by quantity
sql: SELECT sk.sku_name, SUM(s.order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales s JOIN skus sk ON s.sku_id = sk.sku_id GROUP BY sk.sku_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 10
title: Top Selling Products

question: Inventory value distribution by warehouse
sql: SELECT w.warehouse_code, SUM(i.total_value) AS total_value FROM inventory i JOIN warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_code GROUP BY w.warehouse_code ORDER BY total_value DESC
title: Inventory Value by Warehouse

question: Monthly order count trend
sql: SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) AS month_no, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM sales WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) = 2022 GROUP BY month_no ORDER BY month_no
title: Monthly Order Count Trend
